alert.note: Alert for Beaver (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 28 at 8:52PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CDT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of the Panhandle of Oklahoma, including the following county, Beaver. * WHEN...Until midnight CDT tonight. * IMPACTS...Water over roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 848 PM CDT, Emergency management reported water over roads between Highway 83 and Highway 270 along EW 22 Road and within the advisory area due to earlier thunderstorms. Minor flooding is already occurring. Between 2 and 5 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Boyd. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
